text: Dark Shadows is an American gothic soap opera that originally aired weekdays on the ABC television network, from June 27, 1966, to April 2, 1971. In 2004 and 2007, it was ranked #19 and #23 on TV Guides Top Cult Shows Ever.TV Guide's 25 Top Cult Shows — TannerWorld Junction TannerWorld Junction: May 26, 2004TV Guide Names the Top Cult Shows Ever — Today's News: Our Take TV Guide: June 29, 2007 ==References== Category:1966 television series debuts Category:1971 television series endings Category:American soap operas Category:English-language television programs Category:1970s American television series endings
title: Dark Shadows
